thread.title: Ground News - 'The work is incredibly important': How a Winnipeg woman has been helping in Ukraine
thread.title_full: Ground News - 'The work is incredibly important': How a Winnipeg woman has been helping in Ukraine

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - 'The work is incredibly important': How a Winnipeg woman has been helping in Ukraine
text:
Summary by Ground News Patricia Maruschak has spent more than a year in Ukraine rebuilding schools and helping students. She works with Finn Church Aid, a Finnish humanitarian organization that provides education support in emergencies. While working in Ukraine, she has had to leave her husband and two children behind in Winnipeg. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
CTV News Center High Factuality Media Conglomerate: Bell Media 'The work is incredibly important': How a Winnipeg woman has been helping in Ukraine Home for the holidays has taken on a whole new meaning for a Winnipeg woman who has spent more than a year in Ukraine rebuilding schools and helping students.
